conversations.body_text: Hi Jarle Wiik,    We can modify your order for you. Don't worry—any overpayment will be refunded, and any underpayment will be collected.

Thanks for your quick reply.
I’ve changed my mind. Just ship the order ?

Best Regards
Jarle Wiik

fre. 7. nov. 2025 kl. 03:19 skrev service@simsonn.com
Hi Jarle Wiik,    Okay, thank you for your prompt confirmation.
